mapper.insert: insert into memberschedule(no, leaderemail, memberemail, date) values(#{no},#{leaderemail},#{memberemail},#{date})
mapper.select: select date from memberschedule where no=#{no} and leaderemail=#{leaderemail} and memberemail=#{memberemail}
mapper.delete: delete from memberschedule where date=#{date} and memberemail=#{memberemail}
